name: Tea Break
description:
Tea Break is a retro themed platformer where you race against the clock to make as many deliveries as you can before time runs out.

Developed over the course of a few short weeks, Tea Break draws inspiration from games such as crazy taxi and many arcade platformers for a fast paced, and quick lived, experience.

Run, Jump and Climb your way to a new high score, with 3 different power ups, dangerous hazards, in a densely packed city façade all against the ticking clock.

Art: Kyra Benton  (LinkedIn)

Programming: Ruben Antao (LinkedIn), Logan Ryan (LinkedIn)

Design: Timothy Hinshelwood (LinkedIn)
